bio: I'm a lady who loves Crypto so much. I trade and invest on Cryptocurrencies.
contributionDescription: I'll contribute through GitHub repository on-chain contract and through Twitter, linkined an on my Blockchain update site so that the whole world will know what the RetroPGF is all about, Option is the most useful and active L2 that have rewards their users so far. Great project.
impactDescription: My impact is on optimism project as a whole, the number 1 on chain contract that have been rewarding their users through retroactive Airdrops and other incentives, i like the way they carried and valued their users  and community unlike other L2 over they. Keep up the good work.
pwFlaggedReason: This application should be flagged for promising future impact. The individual stated they will contribute through various platforms, which is a promise of future actions and not a reflection of past impact.
